mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mount Vernon leadership with U. S. Post Office officials, February 22, 1932
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Photographic print of members of the Mount Vernon Ladies' Association staff and officials from the U. S. Postal Service, posing under the north colonnade that connects with the servants' hall, February 22, 1932. Only Mount Vernon staff is identified - from left to right: Superintendent, Harrison H. Dodge; a postal official; Assistant Superintendent, James Young; and a postal official. Mounted to a paper support with handwritten caption below.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon Ladies' Association of the Union--Employees
Servants' Hall
